languages.text: "Мы просим сохранить его для нас", {n}— сервиторы Номос говорят неожиданно — шепотом, тихим, как падение пера на снег.{/n}
"We ask you to keep him for us," {n}Nomos's servitors speak up suddenly, in the faintest of whispers.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы просим сохранить его для нас", {n}— сервиторы Номос говорят неожиданно — шепотом, тихим, как падение пера на снег.{/n}

languages.text: 「彼を私たちと一緒に居させてほしい」{n}ノモスのサーヴィターが突然ほとんど聞こえない囁き声で言う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We ask you to keep him for us," {n}Nomos's servitors speak up suddenly, in the faintest of whispers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「彼を私たちと一緒に居させてほしい」{n}ノモスのサーヴィターが突然ほとんど聞こえない囁き声で言う。{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: “为了我们，我们请求你留他一命。”{n}诺莫斯的机仆突然低声开了口，几乎如同耳语一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We ask you to keep him for us," {n}Nomos's servitors speak up suddenly, in the faintest of whispers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “为了我们，我们请求你留他一命。”{n}诺莫斯的奴工突然低声开了口，几乎如同耳语一般。{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: "Wir bitten Euch, ihn für uns zu bewahren"{n}, sagen Nomos' Servitoren plötzlich in einem kaum wahrnehmbaren Flüsterton.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We ask you to keep him for us," {n}Nomos's servitors speak up suddenly, in the faintest of whispers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir bitten Euch, ihn für uns zu bewahren"{n}, sagen Nomos' Servitoren plötzlich in einem kaum wahrnehmbaren Flüsterton.{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: {n}Soudain, les servitors de Nomos prennent la parole dans un chuchotement à peine perceptible :{/n} « Nous vous prions de bien vouloir le garder pour nous. »
languages.original_text: "We ask you to keep him for us," {n}Nomos's servitors speak up suddenly, in the faintest of whispers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, les servitors de Nomos prennent la parole dans un chuchotement à peine perceptible :{/n} « Nous vous prions de bien vouloir le garder pour nous. »
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: «Es nuestro deseo que permanezca con nosotros», {n}intervienen de repente los servidores de Nomos, hablando con un quedo susurro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We ask you to keep him for us," {n}Nomos's servitors speak up suddenly, in the faintest of whispers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es nuestro deseo que permanezca con nosotros», {n}intervienen de repente los servidores de Nomos, hablando con un quedo susurro.{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: "Onu bizim için bağışlamanızı rica ediyoruz." {n}Nomos'un hizmetörleri aniden konuşuyor, sesleri ise ürkek bir fısıltı gibi çıkıyor.{/n}
